div.p: The naakEnterprice Network Partnership

font.b: POWERFULL TOOLS FOR THE FUTURE OF ENERGY

div.h2: POWERFULL TOOLS FOR THE FUTURE OF ENERGY
div.p: Identify the problems and challenges facing network partners

Changes are coming to the way we produce and sell energy. Complicated and ever-changing regulations and technology are already upon us. Today there is an new energy economy emerging, one that is digital, distributed and connected to the internet of energy. How energy is valued has also shifted. What matters now is not how much energy you produce but when you produce it. Does it serve and transact with the grid or does it tax the grid? This new method of valuation has disrupted the ecosystem in which solar once thrived...How do we adapt?

Those of you forward-thinking enough to see this coming will know that an intelligent energy management system with the ability to optimize for the disruptive changes happening in energy will glide through the turbulence without a scratch.
Certifications:
UL  - Zigbee Alliance - RevenueGrade (pending), CALSSA, SEPA, GTM research,
Twist the knife of the problem and make it hurt. Why they will struggle if they don’t adapt.
Adapting to the changes are the only way to remain competitive.
Remember Nokia? Remember Xerox? Remember Blockbuster?

These brands used to dominate their respective industries. They were the gold standard by which all others were judged. And changing technology took them down and now they have no real relevance today. And now that same wind of change is coming to energy. Regulations are changing. Technology is evolving. Cost structures are shifting. Business models are dying.
The old solutions are just not going to satisfy the needs and demands of the market. You must adapt and implement new solutions to these new challenges.
naak's energy cloud provides the platform for you to do just that. Here’s 3 of the many challenges you can beat with naak:
Challenge #1: Differentiating your brand is ever more challenging when all solar companies are saying the same things and using the same software design tools.
Solution: Change the conversation and educate your customer on the changes impacting them and how you are uniquely qualified to help them by giving them control of their energy future.
Challenge #2: Closing a sale because you are the cheapest, is a race to the bottom strategy.

Solution: Educate them on the value of being connected to the Internet of Energy, home automation and the ability to control their energy all while being more prepared and reliliant in the event of an emergency.

Challenge #3: The average customer acquisition cost is over $2000. And if all goes well post install, they’ll never call you back.. Truck rolls quick eat away at your profitability and poor Yelp reviews can do even more damage.

Solution: It’s simple, Increase your Customer Lifetime Value. With naak, your customer remains engaged, through their App where they will control their appliances, the web dashboard and bi-monthly newsletters. Set up simple alerts in your Fleet Dashboard and sell preemptive maintenance and monitoring. Leverage naak’s data analytics to tell you when your customer is ripe for a battery, Smart Home accessories and grid services like Virtual Power Plant and Demand Response programs.
If you did just half of the above, just think of all the referrals you can expect.

li.span: Plug every system you design and build into the Internet of Energy
Build fleets of assets that can be centrally controlled and monitored - DR and VPP ready
Stop handing over your customers to inverter companies offering free monitoring
Dual comms - Reliable 4G cellular connectivity & WiFi
Simple to install and can be remotely commissioned and configured
Expanded service offerings - home automation, energy management, battery control, resiligency, performance guarantees, 24/7 monitoring, O&M
Increased customer retention through engagement - naak App, web dashboard, blogs, notifications, energy report cards, set energy budgets, appliance control
Reduced customer acquisition costs - happy customers give referrals and positive reviews
Leverage naak’s data analytics - create data driven upsell opportunities
All the data you need to size and sell storage - solar production, consumption & solar export
Hardware agnostic - great for retrofits, not beholden to any inverter or manufacturer
Fleet View Dashboard with monitoring & centralized control capability
Customizable alerts and notifications – facilitates O&M, supports preemptive maintenance
Sell Home Automation and leverage the Internet of Things (IoT)revolution
Reduce Truck Rolls due to unreliable WiFi
Provide more timely and cost effective customer service
Lower the barrier of entry for future customers -  sell energy management & home automation

h1.font: naak is your partner and guide

div.p: Offer the solution and describe how and why naak is their perfect ally.
Consider naak your partner in the digital age of energy
There is no doubt that disruptive forces are changing the rules of the game. Policy, incentives, utility rates and technology are fundamentally changing the value of solar.

The naak Energy Cloud Platform is a flexible, reliable and cost effective solution allowing you to address the continuously evolving market challenges while positioning your business to capitalize on opportunities as they emerge

The convergence of powerful technology like battery storage, artificial intelligence, Internet of Things and blockchain are the tools that are enabling the next generation of solar companies to emerge. Those who see it, are positioning themselves to dominate in the new energy economy -  the transactive, bidirectional and customer centric marketplace where new business models are emerging every day.

naak brings all this technology and more to your fingertips. We’re designed from the ground up to help you build your business and keep your customers engaged long term. With the ability to control any energy ecoSystem, naak makes disruption your competitive advantage.
to give your customers control over their energy future.  to install

div.h1: 11 ways the naak platform will be your secreat weapon

div.p: Your vision, credibility, and purpose behind naak
As a solar and energy service provider, you're leading the transition to a decentralized energy marketplace and my mission is to empower you to grow and scale your business.
My approach is centered around leveraging disruptive technologies and other resources to accelerate the emergence of a customer-centric transactive energy network.

I’ve managed commercial scale solar finance, construction and development, and intelligent energy management systems integrating IoT and battery storage. I’ve financed and developed over 1,000 solar installations spanning five states, serving Affordable Housing, Multifamily, Municipal, Industrial, Schools and Residential.
Describe strategic partners and how they lend strength and credibility to the platform
